sqlReaderQuery.value:
Select CSD_CODE
,FILE_NO
,LOT_NO
,OCEAN_AIR
,CUST_CODE
,STRIP_DATE
,HOLD
,DAD
,RECEIVED_DATE
,CONTAINER
,PCS
,POUNDS
,CUBE
,PICKUP_DATE
,HOUSE_REF_NO
,COMMODITY1
,STATE
,ZIP_CNTY
,CONSIGNEE
,STATUS
,TRANSFER_YN
,RELEASEFD_YN
From [dbo].[TblClearedCargo]
where INSERTED_TIMESTAMP >'@{activity('get_last_sync_dt').output.firstRow.LastSyncTimestamp}'  and INSERTED_TIMESTAMP<='@{activity('get_max_inserted_dt').output.firstRow.MaxInsetedTimestamp}'

source.sqlReaderQuery: SELECT TableName FROM [dbo].[ConfigSyncTables] WHERE IsActive=1 AND DeltaLoad=1

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CSD_CODE as string,
		FILE_NO as string,
		LOT_NO as string,
		OCEAN_AIR as string,
		CUST_CODE as string,
		STRIP_DATE as date,
		HOLD as string,
		DAD as string,
		RECEIVED_DATE as date,
		CONTAINER as string,
		PCS as decimal(12,3),
		POUNDS as decimal(12,3),
		CUBE as decimal(12,3),
		PICKUP_DATE as date,
		HOUSE_REF_NO as string,
		COMMODITY1 as string,
		STATE as string,
		ZIP_CNTY as string,
		CONSIGNEE as string,
		STATUS as string,
		TRANSFER_YN as string,
		RELEASEFD_YN as string,
		INSERTED_TIMESTAMP as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ClearedCargo
source(output(
		ID as integer,
		CUST_CODE as string,
		CUSTOMER_NAME as string,
		CUSTOMER_CONTACT as string,
		ADDRESSS1 as string,
		ADDRESSS2 as string,
		CITY as string,
		STATE as string,
		ZIP as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> TradingPartner
ClearedCargo select(mapColumn(
		FILE_NO,
		LOT_NO,
		OCEAN_AIR,
		CUST_CODE,
		PCS,
		POUNDS
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectClearedCargo
TradingPartner select(mapColumn(
		CUST_CODE,
		CUSTOMER_NAME
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectCustomer
SelectClearedCargo, SelectCustomer join(SelectClearedCargo@CUST_CODE == SelectCustomer@CUST_CODE,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 aggregate(groupBy(SelectCustomer@CUST_CODE,
		CUSTOMER_NAME,
		OCEAN_AIR),
	FILE_NO = countDistinct(FILE_NO),
		LOT_NO = count(LOT_NO),
		PICES = sum(PCS),
		POUNDS = sum(POUNDS)) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 sink(input(
		CUST_CODE as string,
		CUST_NAME as string,
		OCEAN_AIR as string,
		FILES as integer,
		LOTS as integer,
		PICES as integer,
		CUBES as decimal(12,3)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		CUST_CODE,
		CUST_NAME = CUSTOMER_NAME,
		OCEAN_AIR,
		FILES = FILE_NO,
		LOTS = LOT_NO,
		PICES,
		CUBES = POUNDS
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
